content.raw: I have a question about test coverage. I don't understand how it is being counted. For example, `rendering/Visual.cc` has a related unit test `rendering/Visual_TEST.cc`, but it shows as having 0/100 functions covered. And in fact, `Visual_TEST.cc` also seems to be [considered](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64/249/clover-report/) a function that should be tested. Am I reading this wrong?
content.html: I have a question about test coverage. I don't understand how it is being counted. For example, rendering/Visual.cc has a related unit test rendering/Visual_TEST.cc, but it shows as having 0/100 functions covered. And in fact, Visual_TEST.cc also seems to be considered a function that should be tested. Am I reading this wrong?
